snippet: The move is the latest development in a case involving the disappearance of an impoverished man from one of Rio de Janeiro’s largest slums.
abstract: Homicide investigators in Brazil say that they will charge 10 police officers with torture and murder in the disappearance of an impoverished construction worker Amarildo de Souza from Rocinha, one of Rio de Janeiro’s largest slums; de Souza's disappearance in July, set off street protests against police brutality in Rio, Sao Paulo and other cities.
lead_paragraph: The move is the latest development in a case involving the disappearance of an impoverished man from one of Rio de Janeiro’s largest slums.

headline.main: Brazilian Officers Will Face Charges of Torture and Murder
headline.print_headline: Brazilian Officers Will Face Charges of Torture and Murder
